name: 吳舜堂
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對工程數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖。課程內容包括：1.Introduction to differential equations2.First-order differential equations3.Higher-order differential equations，4.The Laplace transform5.Series solutions of linear differential equations6.systems of linear differential  equations7.orthogonal functions and fourier series8.boundary-value problems in rectangular
schedule:
第 1 ~4週  : Chapter 4: The Laplce transform 
第4~ 6 週  : Chapter 5 : Series solutions of linear differential equations
第 7~ 12 週  : Chapter 9 : Vector Calculus
第 12~15週  : Chapter 10: Systems of linear differential equations 
第  18  週  : 期末考
